function Infos(props) { const pokemonData = props; console.log("props", props); function getByAbility(url) { $emit("getByAbility"); } return (
{Object.keys(pokemonData.images).length != 0 && ( )}
Nome: {pokemonData.name}
HP: {pokemonData.hp}
Ataque: {pokemonData.attack}
Defesa: {pokemonData.defense}
Velocidade: {pokemonData.velocity}
Peso: {pokemonData.weight}
Tamanho: {pokemonData.size}
Habilidades: {pokemonData.arrayAbilities.map((ability) => (

getByAbility(ability.url)} key={ability.url}> {ability.name}
))}
); } export default Infos;
